description.en: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.ar: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.br: O HP do Pet não diminui por 10 minutos e aumenta o ganho de Exp do Pet em 1.5x
description.cns: 5分钟内保持召唤兽的血不下降,时间一到血继续下降!
description.de: Die HP deines Begleiters verringert sich für 10 Minuten nicht. Es wächst 50% schneller.
description.fi: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.fil: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.fr: Super vitamine stoppant la perte de points de vie du familier pendant 10 min et augmentant son expérience acquise à chaque minute de 50%
description.id: HP pet tidak berkurang selama 10 menit dan kecepatan tumbuh menjadi * 1,5
description.it: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.jp: 10分間ペットのＨＰが減少せず、成長速度が1.5倍早くなります。
description.kr: 10분 동안 리어펫의 HP 감소가 되지 않으며 성장 속도가 1.5배 빨라 집니다. 중복사용 시 누적 시간이 증가하며, 로그아웃 시 누적 시간은 감소하지 않습니다.
description.nl: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.pl: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.ru: Питомец не теряет здоровье в течение 10 минут и растет в полтора раза быстрее.
description.sp: La HP de la mascota no se reduce durante 10 minutos y su velocidad de crecimiento aumenta por 1.5
description.sw: Pet HP does not decrease for 10 minute and growing speed become * 1.5
description.th: HP สัตว์เลี้ยงไม่ลดลงเป็นเวลา 10 นาทีและความเร็วในการเติบโตกลายเป็น * 1.5
description.tw: 10分鐘內召喚獸的HP不會減少，同時成長速度增加1.5倍。
description.vi: HP của vật nuôi không giảm trong 10 phút và tốc độ phát triển * 1.5
